meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tranquil; calmness; peacefulness.
meanings.sent1: The tranquillity of the forest brought a sense of calm to my mind.
meanings.sent2: I love to sit by the lake and enjoy the tranquillity of the water.
meanings.sent3: The tranquillity of the sleeping cat was suddenly interrupted by a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a tranquillity that could soothe even the most troubled souls.
meanings.sent5: The tranquillity of the starry night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A state of quietness and peace.
meanings.sent1: The tranquillity of the library was perfect for studying.
meanings.sent2: The tranquillity of the countryside was a welcome escape from the city noise.
meanings.sent3: The tranquillity of the empty room made it feel eerie.
meanings.sent4: The tranquillity of the ocean at sunrise was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The tranquillity of the garden was disturbed by the buzzing bees.
